definitions.definition: used when you subtract (= take away) one number or thing from another one

examples.text: the former Soviet Union, minus the Baltic republics and Georgia

definitions.definition: used to express temperature below zero degrees

examples.text: The temperature dropped to minus 28 degrees centigrade (−28°C).

definitions.definition: without something that was there before

examples.text: We're going to be minus a car for a while.
The group found itself minus a bass player.

definitions.definition: used when the number mentioned may actually be more or less by a particular amount

examples.text: The margin of error was plus or minus three percentage points.

wordOrigin: late 15th cent.: from Latin, neuter of minor ‘less’.
